name: Quantum Gravity
description:
Quantum Gravity is space themed bullet hell platformer. The game's main mechanic is inverting the gravity to hover through space. It features long-range fights but also melees fighting. Quantum Gravity has a variety of enemies to fight against and also 3 game modes including an infinity game mode, The game can be played on any controller supported while still preserving its quality, and having the same in-game experience as with a keyboard and mouse.

Infinity Mode
The infinity game mode offers an infinite number of levels that increase in their difficulty resulting in hardcore game mechanics. The main goal is to survive and win against the enemies. Including boss fights, and close or ranged combat.

Gravity Mode
The gravity game mode has its special mechanic. While in the other game modes you can only invert the player's mechanic, in the gravity game mode you can also invert the gravity of the objects around you. Making the gameplay a special experience due to its complexity.

Campaign
The campaign features many challenging levels, ranging from hostage defense to destroying targets and finding solutions to game puzzles. While having the full equipment of a bullet hell shooter.

But the campaign mode never ends every few bigger updates and events the campaign mode will change and suit itself to the occurring event. Making the experience of this game infinity.
